}} 'The Bubble' (Hebrew: '××××¢×' HaBuah) is a 2006 romantic drama directed
by Eytan Fox telling the story of two men who fall in love, one Israeli and
one Palestinian. The title of the film refers to
Tel Aviv, a relatively peaceful city in a tumultuous region and the setting
of the film.
categories: Films about the Israel Defense Forces
